title: Building an AI-Powered Document Generation System
excerpt: Designing and implementing a full-stack application that transforms lectures and reference materials into structured study documents using LLM orchestration, custom Markdown parsing, and sequential content generation.
author: Giovanni Gravili

title: Ground-State Energy via DFT for Helium
excerpt: Implementation of ground-state energy of Helium atom computed via the Density Functional Theory (DFT) framework using Julia.
author: Giovanni Gravili

title: Reverse Engineering the Tobii Eye Tracker 5 Protocol
excerpt: A deep dive into reverse engineering the Tobii Eye Tracker 5 SDK using Ghidra, exploring USB protocols, encrypted payloads, and the challenges of breaking commercial eye tracking systems.
author: Giovanni Gravili

title: Real-Time Digit Recognition on Arduino with TensorFlow
excerpt: Building a complete handwritten digit recognition system using Arduino Nano 33 BLE Sense camera and a trained CNN model, bridging embedded vision with machine learning inference.
author: Giovanni Gravili

title: Building a Networked Game Engine with Entity-Component Architecture
excerpt: Implementing a RESTful game engine server using the Entity-Component-System pattern, Flask for HTTP control, and VisPy for real-time 3D rendering with thread-safe concurrent operations.
author: Giovanni Gravili

title: Visualizing Quantum Confinement Through Brillouin Zone Analysis
excerpt: Band structure and density of states calculations for quantum-confined systems using Mathematica.
author: Giovanni Gravili

title: Symbolic Mathematics Engine in Haskell
excerpt: Building a symbolic mathematics library from scratch in Haskell, exploring algebraic manipulation, differentiation, and Taylor series expansion through functional programming.
author: Giovanni Gravili

title: Visualize Anki Learning Progress
excerpt: TL;DR â€“ A Chrome extension that highlights words on web pages based on Anki card difficulty levels based on mastery.
author: Giovanni Gravili

title: Building a PDF Generation Library from Scratch in Rust
excerpt: Implementing a complete PDF generation library in Rust with JSON document support, TTF font embedding, and low-level PDF spec compliance for deterministic output suitable for regression testing.
author: Giovanni Gravili

title: Bringing Desktop Mascots to macOS with Swift
excerpt: Implementing two desktop mascot applications in Swift: a modern recreation of the classic Neko cat that chases the mouse cursor, and a physics-based pendulum mascot using SpriteKit for realistic swinging motion.
author: Giovanni Gravili
